title: BERT
description: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding. One of the most popular work in Natural Language Processing area this year.

title: Disentangle Causal Mechanism
description: A Meta-Transfer Objective for Learning to Disentangle Causal Mechanisms. Latest work from Yoshua Bengio on causal inference.

title: ResNet
description: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition. A masterpiece in Computer Vision bringing deep network in practice.

title: XLNet
description: XLNet: Generalized Autoregressive Pretraining for Language Understanding. The strongest competitor to top models in NLP.

title: GAN
description: 'Generative Adversarial Networks. "The most interesting idea in the last 10 years in ML." - Yann LeCun.'

title: GraphSage
description: Inductive Representation Learning on Large Graphs. Representation learning for dynamic graphs by Jure Leskovec.

title: Variational Information Bottleneck
description: Specializing Word Embeddings (for Parsing) by Information Bottleneck. Best paper for EMNLP 2019.

title: Visual Question Answering
description: VQA: Visual Question Answering. New challenge for understanding both vision and language.

title: Deep RL
description: Playing Atari with Deep Reinforcement Learning. Stepping into Deep RL.

title: DCNN
description: Densely Connected Convolutional Networks. Best Paper on CVPR 2017.

title: Masked R-CNN
description: Mask R-CNN. Milestone for object recognition.

title: Adam
description: Adam: A method for stochastic optimization. One of the most popular optimizer for deep learning.

title: ArnetMiner
description: ArnetMiner: extraction and mining of academic social networks. The ground work of AMiner.

title: NetSMF
description: NetSMF: Large-Scale Network Embedding as Sparse Matrix Factorization. A sparse network embedding methond on WWW'2019.

title: ProNE
description: ProNE - Fast and Scalable Network Representation Learning. An advanced highly efficient network embedding technique.
